channel.title: Spring 2023 on Columbia DSI Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Spring 2023 on Columbia DSI Scholars

item.title: Call for Faculty Participation --- DSI Scholars Spring-Summer 2023
item.description:
Call for Faculty Participation- Spring-Summer 2023.

The Data Science Institute is calling for faculty submissions of research projects for the Spring and Summer 2023 sessions of the Data Science Institute (DSI) Scholars Program. The goal of the DSI Scholars Program is to engage undergraduate and master students to work with Columbia faculty, through the creation of data science research internships. Last year, we worked with over 30 projects and received more than 250 unique applications from Columbia Students. The program’s unique enrichment activities foster a learning and collaborative community in data science at Columbia. Apply here.

item.title: Data For Good: African North Americans Database
item.description: This project is the first comprehensive examination of African North Americans who crossed one of the U.S.-Canada borders, going either direction, after the Underground Railroad, in the generation alive roughly 1865-1930. It analyzes census and other records to match individuals and families across the decades, despite changes or ambiguities in their names, ages, “color,” birthplace, or other details.
